ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Did everyone give up on EQ?
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually took about 3 months off due to the fact that I had alot of personal business to take care of. I am back now playing in a somewhat regular basis...
ygData.messageBody:
I actually took about 3 months off due to the fact that I had alot of personal business to take care of.  I am back now playing in a somewhat regular basis... when I can LOL... and am having fun at "relearning" the game.  By the way... I play on Ayonae Ro.

Rico
